name: .TAX2022 File Extension
summary: Learn about .TAX2022 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a TAX2022 file with the desktop version of Intuit TurboTax 2022 in Windows and macOS. To open a TAX2022 file, select File → Open Tax Return.

You can also open tax returns in TurboTax Online when importing tax data from the previous year. For example, you can upload a TAX2022 file when filing taxes for the 2023 calendar year. To open a TAX2022 file with TurboTax Online, select Tax Tools → Tools, click "Transfer last year's TurboTax return from your computer," then follow the prompts to upload the file.

NOTE: TurboTax users preparing their TAX2022 tax returns may encrypt them with password protection to protect their sensitive contents. If the file is encrypted, you can only open it by entering the correct password.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
